turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order for delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. And what would you like to purchase?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're going to get four medium pizzas. They're going to be barbecue chicken with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want all 4 pizzas to be barbecue chicken?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you want 4 medium pizzas, barbecue chicken with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for your order will be $44.55.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to purchase the food now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. I've placed your order at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The food will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can help with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it.
